title: Remote Viewing - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/25/22
itunes:title: Remote Viewing - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/25/22
description:
Guest host Connie Willis and retired Army remote viewer Lyn Buchanan discuss his career using his mental abilities to remote view important enemy military targets, Heaven and Hell, and even a secret UFO base for humans and aliens in Australia.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
